CustomField.formula: IF( Count_of_Serial_s__c > 0, IF(Count_of_lines_with_Open_Status__c > 0, 'Open', IF( Count_of_lines_with_Received_Status__c >0 , 'Received', IF( Count_of_lines_with_FV_Status__c >0 ,'Failure Verification', IF( Count_of_lines_with_FA_Status__c > 0 , 'Failure Analysis', IF( Count_of_lines_with_2nd_FA_Status__c >0 ,'2nd Failure Analysis', IF(Count_of_lines_with_CA_Status__c > 0 , 'Corrective Action', IF(Count_of_lines_with_Disposition_Status__c > 0, 'Disposition', IF(Count_of_lines_with_OL_Status__c>0,'Outbound Logistics', IF(Count_of_lines_with_other_Status__c > 0, 'Others', IF(Count_of_lines_with_Hold_Status__c>0, 'Hold',IF(Count_of_Completed_Serial_s__c = Count_of_Serial_s__c, 'Closed', 'Open') )))))))))), "Closed - No S/Ns")
CustomField.label: Order Line FV/FA Status
